message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'm willing to give you a good chunk of the money.
Your offer was generous, Alice, but let's make it a little more even. Time is money, after all!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think a slightly bigger share is fair. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
Alice, let's be realistic. Inflation is eating our money! A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
